s.text: The working assumption at many companies, the paper says, is "if you don't have children, you don't have a life and are available to stay late and take the business trips from hell."
The working assumption at many companies, the paper says, is "if you don't have children, you don't have a life and are available to stay late and take the business trips from hell."
Maureen Dowd opines that Bob Dole has had a face lift and she thinks she knows why: "Because he really, really wants to be First Lady."
